pinyin: duo1 xing2 he2 bai2 xi4 bao1

sentences.english: The existence of large second phases is found to be beneficial to nucleation.
sentences.chinese: 粗大的第二相粒子对再结晶形核具有促进作用。

sentences.english: Holding in the lower pearlite range accelerates subsequent transformation to bainite.
sentences.chinese: 下珠光体区停留促进贝茵体的形核过程。

sentences.english: The nucleated cracks cannot propagate and the cleavage fracture cannot be triggered.
sentences.chinese: 因此形核的裂纹因不能扩展而不能引发解理断裂。

sentences.english: This verifies the existence of dislocation pile-up and its stimulation to the nucleation of microcracks.
sentences.chinese: 证实了位错塞积的存在及其对微裂纹形核的促进作用。

sentences.english: These lath martensite first nucleates in parent austenite intergranular and twin boundary.
sentences.chinese: 应变诱发马氏体首先在原奥氏体晶界和孪晶界形核。

sentences.english: The ball-like diamond films grow up by means of multiplying of second nucleating.
sentences.chinese: 球形金刚石薄膜以二次形核方式繁衍生长。

definition: crystal lattice (the regular 3-dimensional pattern formed by atoms in a crystal)
abbr. of 樹枝狀晶|树枝状晶[shu4 zhi1 zhuang4 jing1]
(chemistry) mass transfer (as observed in processes like evaporation, distillation and membrane filtration)
to de-absorb/to get a chemical out of solution
